title: Value type - short int long signed 16 bit 32 bit 64 bit integers

It is also possible to make these types nullable, meaning that additionally to the usual values, null can be assigned, too. If a variable of a nullable type is not initialized, it will be null instead of 0. Nullable types are marked by adding a question mark (?) after the type.

inline_content.Text: It is also possible to make these types nullable, meaning that additionally to the usual values, null can be assigned, too. If a variable of a nullable type is not initialized, it will be null instead of 0. Nullable types are marked by adding a question mark (?) after the type.

title:
int a;  // This is now 0.
int? b; // This is now null.

content_resolved.code:
int a;  // This is now 0.
int? b; // This is now null.
